column1: Create wallet and set auto-receive preference
column2: Create a wallet and set the auto-receive preference in the node-management screen.
Automatically receive a transaction by enabling the auto-receive preference.
Manually receive a transaction by disabling the auto-receive preference and manually receive it from the pending transaction list.

column1: Start & complete native P2P Swap with auto-receive enabled
column2: Start a native swap, wait for the counterparty to join and complete the swap with auto-receive enabled.

column1: Start & complete native P2P Swap with auto-receive disabled
column2: Start a native swap, wait for the counterparty to join and complete the swap with auto-receive disabled.

column1: Join & complete native P2P Swap with auto-receive enabled
column2: Join a native swap and wait for the counterparty to complete the swap with auto-receive enabled.

column1: Join & complete native P2P Swap with auto-receive disabled
column2: Join a native swap and wait for the counterparty to complete the swap with auto-receive disabled.

column1: Reset wallet and verify auto-receive after confirmation
column2: Reset and reinitialize the wallet and verify that no transactions are automatically received before confirming the auto-receive preference.
